text: (Napiyē!) Avarkaḷuṭaiya celvaṅkaḷum, avarkaḷuṭaiya makkaḷum (perukiyiruppatu) uṅkaḷai āccariyappaṭutta vēṇṭām. Allāh (avaṟṟai avarkaḷukkuk koṭuttu) avaṟṟaik koṇṭu avarkaḷai ivvulaka vāḻvilēyē vētaṉai ceyya niccayamāka nāṭukiṟāṉ. Iṉṉum, avarkaḷ nirākarippavarkaḷāka irukkum nilaimaiyil avarkaḷuṭaiya uyir pōvataiyum nāṭukiṟāṉ
